name: ftlabs-chrome-screens-app-kiosk
description: A kiosk-enabled Chrome app that ties into the FT Labs Screens system.

scripts.watch: npm run build && sh -c 'nodemon -e js --watch src/scripts/ --exec "npm run deploy" & wait'
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && cp -R ./src ./build && npm run build && zip -r ./build/package.zip ./build

author: FTLabs
